metadata.Title: CVE-2016-4484 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: The Debian initrd script for the cryptsetup package 2:1.7.3-2 and earlier allows physically proximate attackers to gain shell access via many log in attempts with an invalid password.

criterions.comment: cryptsetup package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2:2.3.3-1ubuntu4').
